creator: Dmitry Nazarov
descriptionHtml:
Simple text Notepad without ads with encryption of individual notes

Features:
- notes are stored in text files;
- you can create folders and sub-folders;
- you can specify the path for storing notes;
- you can encrypt individual notes using the AES-256 algorithm;
- you can change the color theme of the notebook;
- you can insert image files from the gallery via "Share";
- you can insert any other types of files in the folder with notes;
- you can enable operation without titles;
- custom colors of folders, notes and files.
descriptionShort: Simple text Notepad without ads with encryption of individual notes

appDetails.developerAddress: 390005, Russia, Ryazan, ul. Shevchenko, d. 27, apt. 69
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- synchronization of notes and backups with google-drive (paid function);
- access to notes and backups from a web browser and from a local disk using the built-in capabilities of the google disk;
- new design of the settings window;
- the classic mechanism for distributing the program with an APK file is returned;
- added support for working with files ".log", ". md", ". csv", ". xml" in text mode.

title: Notepad

container.value: 390005, Russia, Ryazan, ul. Shevchenko, d. 27, apt. 69

creator: Dmitry Nazarov
descriptionHtml:
Ad-free text notepad for taking notes.

Features:
- notes are stored in text files;
- you can create folders and sub-folders of unlimited nesting;
- you can specify the path for storing notes, including a removable memory card;
- you can encrypt individual notes using the AES-256 algorithm (paid function), you do not need to enter a password to access the rest of the notes;;
- you can enable (or disable) synchronization with the Google drive and as a result get access to notes from a browser or from a personal computer (paid function);
- you can change the color theme of the notebook;
- backups are created every night and only if something has changed;
- you can insert images from the "Gallery" into folders with notes;
- you can insert files of any other types (* .doc, * .xls, etc.) to view or modify them in external applications.

Attention!
Unless you plan on making in-app purchases. You are not interested in encrypting and syncing notes with Google Drive and computer. In this case, a lightweight, absolutely free version of Notepad will suit you, from which this functionality is cut out http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ru.diman169.notepad.lite

You are looking for a Notepad in which you can store confidential data and you are alarmed if such a program has access to the Internet. In this case, you should pay attention to the "Notepad for paronoics". It strips out the ability to sync with Google Drive and does not require permission to access the internet.
http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ru.diman169.notepad.paranoid
descriptionShort: Ad-free text notepad for taking notes

- you can create folders and sub-folders of unlimited nesting;
- you can specify the path for storing notes, including a removable memory card;
- you can encrypt individual notes using the AES-256 algorithm (paid function), you do not need to enter a password to access the rest of the notes;;
- you can enable (or disable) synchronization with the Google drive and as a result get access to notes from a browser or from a personal computer (paid function);
- you can change the color theme of the notebook;
- backups are created every night and only if something has changed;
- you can insert images from the "Gallery" into folders with notes;
- you can insert files of any other types (* .doc, * .xls, etc.) to view or modify them in external applications.

Attention!
Unless you plan on making in-app purchases. You are not interested in encrypting and syncing notes with Google Drive and computer. In this case, a lightweight, absolutely free version of Notepad will suit you, from which this functionality is cut out http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ru.diman169.notepad.lite

You are looking for a Notepad in which you can store confidential data and you are alarmed if such a program has access to the Internet. In this case, you should pay attention to the "Notepad for paronoics". It strips out the ability to sync with Google Drive and does not require permission to access the internet.
http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ru.diman169.notepad.paranoid
descriptionShort: Ad-free text notepad for taking notes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- added custom folder sorting other than global sort
- new file properties window with actions:
- rename the file,
- set/unset the color of the file(s),
- hide/show file(s),
- encrypt/decrypt file(s)
- in the navigation pane, a new menu with the last opened files
- new option to disable swipe for forced synchronization
- new option "Use double tap on note to switch to edit mode"
- new option "Use a numeric password"
- search in Notepad settings
